description:
Long before the events of this series began, Hazuki Fuyuka (later to be come http://anidb.net/ch25730 [Fuyuka Liqueur]) took lessons of paranormal exercises by the famous sorcerer http://anidb.net/ch25713 [Gigelf Liqueur].
Years later she worked as news anchor for the TV station "TV Kanto" where she became close with Gigelf whom she married later, and eventually gave birth to their daughter http://anidb.net/ch13443 [Katsumi Liqueur].
name: Hazuki Fuyuka
